titleStmt.title: A modest detection of George Keith's (miscalled) Just vindication of his earnest expostulation published by him as a pretended answer to a late book of mine, entituled, Some brief observations, &c. By E.P.
titleStmt.author: Penington, Edward, 1667-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed and sold by T. Sowle, near the Meeting-House in White-Hart-Court in Gracious-Street, and at the Bible in Leaden-Hall Street, near the Market,

notesStmt.note: E.P. = Edward Penington, whose name appears at the foot of p.56.
A reply to: Keith, George. A just vindication of my earnest expostulation, added to my book, called The Antichrists and Sadduces detected, &c.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends House Library, London.
